title: Banned for boosting after account was stolen
body:
My account was stolen sometime back around august, after having not played league in around 7 months. I decided to pick the game back up, only to come back and find it somehow hacked. I opened a ticket, was able to get my account back, and have been playing fine ever since. 

However, I was recently banned for account boosting, which I know to literally have been impossible, as since coming back and regaining control of my account, I have not played a single ranked game. The fact that my account was somehow stolen was proven, I provided a ton of evidence to the mod, and I also don't see any reason for me to have wanted to suddenly boost the account after not having played for 7 months. I also rarely if ever played ranked matches before this season, as I generally just play normal games for fun with my friends. 

I opened a ticket with a mod to try and resolve this, and was given a copy/paste response about an hour later about why boosting is bad. I replied again, and have not gotten a response since. At this rate I'm afraid my ban will simply expire before I get a response and this gets resolved, as there are only 6 days left. If anyone has any advice on how to prove that I was not boosting, any evidence I can give, I would be happy to hear it. Looking at my match history, it's very clear that I was not playing for a large amount of time, then suddenly came back, changed my summoner name, and started playing wildly different champions than I ever had before; in addition to a large amount of other more private evidence, someone clearly had stolen my account. 

If a mod is to see this, any help in expediting the process or information on what I can do is greatly appreciated. I would also say that any rewards that were stripped due to this ban are honestly fine with me, I never cared for ranked anyway, but it would be nice to get them back, with the exception of the season 7 rewards as those were not won by me, but by whoever stole my account.

replies.body: No worries fam we gotchu. I've got some agents double checking this all for you, so be sure to check back in your tickets ^_^!

Just got the response and closed ticket, thank you very much to you and the mod who resolved it. I understand, these things happen, you have to do your best to prevent boosting and other behaviors like it. Just glad to not have a black mark on my account. 

Thanks again.
I’m also glad to see that things are resolved like this - I always say that Riot does what’s right for the players and I’m glad that you were able to experience that. :)

Hey, 

I wanted to know, did you just get the league account hacked? Because in that case you can simply change the password since only you have access to the e-mail right? Just curious. Ty!
